about_the_game:
Step into this living, breathing world of nature and explore this magnificent environment where every tree and plant lives its life. Start your adventure to discover networks of caves and mysterious underground lakes that lie deep underground.

Cut down trees to gather supplies for camping or build a fire to feel the warmth. Learn to gather the food nature provides to stave off hunger and survive.

You can build your own small shelter or construct a magnificent castle towering in the cool breezes of the ocean. Create traps and defenses to ensure safety and shelter from nature's challenges.

Spend your time exploring and building new places during the day. But be ready to protect your base at night, because enemies can always get close. Improve your self-defense skills by crafting weapons and vehicles. Later in the evening, retreat to your bunker or feel free to confront enemies directly.

While honing your own skills, bravely develop defense strategies against enemy clans and stand up to the brutality of war. Dodge enemies using stealth or tackle them head-on with crude weapons made of sticks and stones.

This breathing world offers endless possibilities to survive and thrive. Plan your every step carefully and prove yourself in this living, breathing world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later - 64-bit operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700HQ or above / AMD Ryzen 5 2500U or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 950M or higher / AMD Radeon RX 550 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics Card Memory Usage Average: 1.5 GB

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later - 64-bit operating system
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
